misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a wealth of experience to the greens. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami is known for his calm demeanor and strategic play.

A regular competitor in the Finnish Mid Tour, Sami has consistently demonstrated his skills, achieving respectable results. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Sami's dedication remains unwavering.

With six past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Sami is slated to make his seventh appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Golfing enthusiasts can anticipate another strong showing from this seasoned player.
